main.title: an elementary school
main.body: what remains of a school stands out from the endless wasteland. ash and rubble covers most of what remains. a sign juts out from the ashen wasteland. "they were the future." nothing more can be read from the fragmented sign. a shattered window is the only way in or out.

classroom.title: the barren classroom
classroom.body: you come to see the remains of an empty classroom. someone must've taken whatever was once in this room long ago. there are no sources of light in here other than shattered window. a doorframe, robbed of its door, stands alone in the corner of the room.

hallway.title: the hallway
hallway.body: a barren hall stretches into the unknown brought on by the darkness. all that remains is the familiar ash covering the floor. a few empty doorways are visible but the rooms are too dark to safely enter. footprints, faded by time, lead down the hall into the darkness. a faint sound comes from the right, almost inaudible.

door.title: the door
door.body: a doors stands at the end of the hall. a blue light shining from under the door illuminates the hall. the sound is still unrecognizable.

video.title: the video
video.body: the door swings open with no resistance and a projector plays a looped video on a wall, somehow receiving electricity. a turtle ducking into it's shell is repeated endlessly.he ducked and covered, ducked and covered.in the rest of the room, human skeletons lay under each desk. school supplies still sitting the desks.

pile.title: a pile of ash
pile.body: you follow the footsteps until they end at a pile of ash. the hill stretches into the abyss with no end in sight. climbing the mound would leave you buried for eternity. there is no point in risking your life here.
pile.visitedBody: you follow the footsteps until they end at a pile of ash. the hill stretches into the abyss with no end in sight. climbing the mound would leave you buried for eternity. you notice a heap of ash next to a small tunnel going through the pile; one can barely squeeze through.

kitchen.title: the kitchen
kitchen.body: digging through the pile, you find a room. as you step through it is recognized to be a kitchen. the shelves are littered with empty cans. whatever food was once here is now gone. a small light is shining in the corner. as you near the source of the glow, you see a lumpy sleeping bag with a skull poking out, long since rotted.

supplies.title: the kitchen
supplies.body:
something worthwhile may still be here, left behind.

Thanks for checking out this house and spending the time to get a shovel for this.
